column4: i use xmms normally but since i did my hoary install it just seems to not play and then crash when i do hit the play button. so i tried to build it from source and heres the error i got. checking how to run the C++ preprocessor... /lib/cpp
configure: error: C++ preprocessor "/lib/cpp" fails sanity check
apt-get build-dep xmms && apt-get -b source xmms
i got an error from that aswell.  Build-dependencies for xmms could not be satisfied.
make sure you have the necessary repos enabled
i do have all of them
that's not possible, else you'd not get the /lib/cpp sanity error
could this be the reason for my xmms issue
so why are you compiling xmms?
you were supposed to switch the output plugin to esound if you were using the default ubuntu settings
did it work with the oss output if you pkilled esd?
alsa ppc support is lacking up through 1.0.8
